DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect eNOS activate agent triflusal episodic memory cognitive function healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Triflusal Cognitive Functions Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Randomised , placebo control , double blind , cross-over design Primary study outcome : Performance picturial verbal memory task . Main secondary outcome : Performance work memory cognitive task influence mood , depression anxiety motivation . Once daily oral administration placebo mannitol 7 day cross-over trial washout period least 14 day two period . Each participant take triflusal well placebo
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male female Normotensive BMI 20 27 kg/m2 Aged 18 40 year Native fluent Germanspeaking Caucasian Female practicing safe contraception Acute chronic psychiatric somatic disorder Any contraindication aspirin NSAIDS History coagulation disease History gastrointestinal disease Laboratory exclusion criterion : value blood count , blood chemistry coagulation status outside normal range Pathological ECG Pregnancy , breastfeed
